title: IAA Tonight | Kyler Murray Addresses Contract Clause Criticism
description: Arizona Cardinals QB Kyler Murray felt 'disrespected' because people are criticizing his preparation habits after it was revealed in his contract that he has to study film for four hours a week outside of practice. Brandon Marshall, Adam Pacman Jones, and Ashley Nicole Moss discuss the fallout of the clause being put in his contract. NFL Free Agent Linebacker Brandon Copeland joins the show to discuss his podcast Money Music Culture and much more!
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Brandon Marshall, Adam Pacman Jones, Ashley Nicole Moss, Brandon Copeland)
